text.tspan: Death rate from air pollution, World
Estimated number of deaths attributed to different types of air pollution per 100,000 population. Deaths can be
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
